name: BlueprintLab_343N
title: The Blueprint Designer Lab - 343N's Edit
author: 343N, Bud, Likos, Schoos, daniel90c, minno, Blu3wolf
description:
Enter your lab to design your blueprints. Builds off of Blu3wolf's version. 

Adds a toggleable 'pausing' feature for singleplayer (on by default), as well as support for using Editor Extensions items in the Lab, and a fix for a bug that stops you from breaking items in the Lab, when Space Exploration is installed.
